title: Katie Holmes cuts a chic fall look in a black duster with orange eyeshadow during a stroll in NYC
text:
Katie Holmes seems to be enjoying the single life following her recent breakup with Jamie Foxx.

The Dawson's Creek actress was smiling from ear to ear as she stepped out Tuesday for a stroll through New York City.

The Ohio native cut a chic fall look with a fun yet understated splash of color as she was spotted on a coffee run.

All smiles: Katie Holmes was all smiles as she stepped out Tuesday for stroll through New York City

The 40-year-old sported a thick black duster for a timeless autumn- in-New York ensemble.

She wore the classic coat unbuttoned over a stylish beige ribbed turtleneck sweater for a '90s throwback look.

The sweater tucked into a pair of light denim slim high-waisted jeans, which hugged her toned legs.

She completed the casual chic look with a pair of black leather Doc Marten style boots.

Autumn chic: The 40-year-old sported a thick black duster for a timeless autumn in New York ensemble

'90s throwback: She wore the classic coat unbuttoned over a stylish beige ribbed turtleneck sweater for a '90s throwback look

Big girl boots: The sweater tucked into a pair of light denim slim high-waisted jeans, which hugged her toned legs. She completed the casual chic look with a pair of black leather Doc Marten style boots

Euphoria vibes: She added an unexpected splash of color to her look with a bold orange eyeshadow, channeling some Euphoria vibes

Good chat: The Dawson's Creek actress was beaming as she took a phone call during her solo outing

Holmes carried a black leather handbag, which gold embellishments, including a chain hanging from the strap.

She added an unexpected splash of color to her look with a bold orange eyeshadow, channeling some Euphoria vibes.

The Dawson's Creek actress was beaming as she took a phone call during her solo outing.

She and Foxx called it quits back in May, shortly after making their first public appearance together as a couple at the Met Gala, though the split was not announced until August.

Although their relationship remained mostly private, the couple was first romantically linked in 2013, following Holmes' divorce from Tom Cruise.
description: She and Jamie Foxx called it quits back in May, shortly after making their first public appearance together as a couple at the Met Gala.They were first romantically linked in 2013, shortly after her divorce.
